text:
Image zoom Source: Danielle Torriero/Instagram

It’s going to be a boy for Talan Torriero and his wife Danielle.

The couple announced they are expecting a son, according to an Instagram video Talan posted Monday.

Get push notifications with news, features and more.

“@danielletorriero and I are thrilled to announce that we are having a boy in Oct!” he wrote in the caption.

The couple announced the pregnancy in April on Instagram, writing, “#BabyTorriero coming Oct. 2017. @danielletorriero 13 weeks & counting.”

FROM PEN: Today’s Savannah Guthrie Was Very Superstitious About Her Pregnancy: “I Didn’t Want to Jinx It”

The married couple tied the knot in June 2014, though they’ve been together for eight years.

Talan is the latest to join the string of Laguna Beach and The Hills alums in the soon-to-be parents club.

In January, Lauren Conrad announced that she’s expecting her first child with husband William Tell. A month later, Jason Wahler and wife Ashley Slack announced they have a baby on the way.

Although Whitney Port wasn’t involved in the MTV series until The Hills spinoff, she announced she is expecting with husband Tim Rosenman in February.
title: Laguna Beach's Talan Torriero and Wife Danielle Expecting a Baby Boy
